extendedInfo.description: Clubstr is your gay men's lifestyle guide to bars, clubs, lounges, andentertainment. Clubstr is your first and #1 club and party finder for gay men. Find a party, throw a party, and be the party all with the click of a few buttons. Check to see what hot guys are going to what parties. Throw a party at a club and invite all your friends to RSVP with the Clubstr Application. Use the (I'm Coming) button on Clubstr to let people know what club you'll be attending. Use the club finder tool as your personal GPS to find clubs and bars in your area. Receive drink special alerts and cover charge discount alerts with this application. Clubstr helps you find the best club and drink specials to fit your lifestyle. Nightclub and bar hopping has never been so easy!Enjoy the hype of knowing what guys are going to the same nightclub as you.FEATURES:-Push Notification Support-Photo Upload-Gay bar,club, and lounge Finder-Gay NightClub Check in Service-Gay NightClub GPS and Profile-Nightlife Promotions from the most popular gay cities
